item.title: Tickets available now! Get your Super Early Bird Tickets today! Venue confirmed too!

item.description: PHPConf.Asia is happening on 22 & 23 September at NUSS Kent Ridge Guild House. Get your tickets today! PS: Speakers will be confirmed soon.
item.content:encoded:
PHPConf.Asia is happening on 22 & 23 September at NUSS Kent Ridge Guild House. Get your tickets today!

PS: Speakers will be confirmed soon.

item.title: Launch of CFP & Change of Conference Dates
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Launch of CFP We are proud to announce the opening of the CFP. You may submit your CFP here. The talk formats are as follows: 45 minute talks. 15 minute lightning talks. We are looking for talks of various levels – beginners, intermediate and advanced. Thematically, you could focus on one of the following keywords: […]
item.content:encoded:
Launch of CFP

We are proud to announce the opening of the CFP. You may submit your CFP here.

The talk formats are as follows:

  • 45 minute talks.
  • 15 minute lightning talks.

We are looking for talks of various levels – beginners, intermediate and advanced.

Thematically, you could focus on one of the following keywords: web development, front-end development, backend development, DevOps, big data, enterprise applications, Internet of Things, frameworks, advanced OOP, TDD, BDD, agile methodologies, disruptive technologies, robotics, etc.

Closing date for CFP submission is 15 July 2015.

Change of Conference Dates

The conference dates will be rescheduled toÂ 22 and 23 September 2015.

This is due to one of the previous dates (24th) coinciding with a Singapore public / religious holiday (Hari Raya Haji).

We apologise for the inconvenience this news might have brought to some folks.
